attributes.action: To make it the norm that vehicles can turn left at traffic lights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With more& more traffic on our roads it would help ease congestion & at the time go some way to reducing pollution if all vehicles road were permitted to turn left at traffic lights providing it was safe to do so

The PC & Health & Safety Brigrades will no doubt  bring up the question about pedestrians safety

Aren't we are all pedestrian? are they saying we are to stupid for this to work

It works in other country's so there no reason that it won't work here in the UK
